name: Quantum Evasion
description:
First try on a game jam. Made in 3 days for ScoreSpace Jam#13.

There is no loading screen while game is downloading resources. Please wait a few minutes.

Tap on screen to move player!

Dodge enemies and bullets to survive in this game with no weapons. Enemies will shoot, dash and close in to explode at you.

Watch out for enemies preparing to attack by watching them flash. This is the only time you can kill that enemy by jumping to them.

This is barely at prototype stage. I might continue development on this.

Featuring Music by Matthew Pablo - "Space Dimensions (Techno Version)"

http://www.matthewpablo.com
